com.google.gwt.language.client.transliteration.control
Class TransliterationEventListener

java.lang.Object
  com.google.gwt.language.client.transliteration.control.TransliterationEventListener

public abstract class TransliterationEventListener
extends java.lang.Object

Listener of transliteration events. Override this class' abstract method onEvent() to put your own logic.
